title: Spotify’s New Playbook for Staying on Top
description:
Changes are happening at Spotify and it goes beyond its C-suite.
On this episode of the Everybody's Business podcast, Bloomberg reporter Ashley Carman joins Stacey Vanek Smith and Max Chafkin to discuss the music streaming platform's bold new business plan of getting into… everything. We also talk about AI's role in the future of music. (Source: Bloomberg)
